taskDescription:
If  possible, subtract the following irrational numbers without using a calculator. If this is not possible, state why. <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>2.1</mn>
  <msqrt>
    <mn>45</mn>
  </msqrt>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>3.7</mn>
  <msqrt>
    <mn>5</mn>
  </msqrt>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">2.1\sqrt {45}  - 3.7\sqrt 5</annotation></semantics></math>
detailedSolution: The two numbers being subtracted do not have the same irrational part, so the operation cannot be performed without a calculator.
